channel.title: varanam on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in varanam on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Annal Mele Panithuli
item.description: This soft and melodious song comes from the movie Varanam Aayiram. Surya, who has proved his talent several times before, does it again in this movie playing the role of the father and playing the son from his late teens into manhood.
